title: Wicked Road to Hell
description: “Juliana Stone rocks!”—Ann Aguirre, bestselling author of Doubleblind and Blue Diablo“Stone is on her way to becoming a paranormal favorite.”—Sherrilyn KenyonAlready one of the most exciting and acclaimed authors of shapeshifter and paranormal romance, Juliana Stone now spins off from her sensational Jaguar Warriors series to introduce a breathtaking new supernatural band of heroes and heroines: the League of Guardians. In Wicked Road to Hell, vampire Ana comes back from the dead with vengeance on her mind—and sexy magician Declan in her heart. Fans of Nalini Singh and Pamela Palmer will adore Stone’s League of Guardians—as the incomparable storyteller expands and darkens her extraordinary world, and sets it ablaze with phenomenal paranormal passion.
author: Juliana Stone
